section_text: 12 1 There shall be paid out of moneys provided by Parliament any increase attributable to this Act in the sums so payable under any other Act. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
13 Schedule 4 to this Act shall have effect for adapting the provisions of this Act there mentioned in their application to Northern Ireland.

section_title: Short title, citation, interpretation, commencement and repeals.
section_text: 14 1 This Act may be cited as the Social Security Benefits Act 1975. 2 This Act may be cited with the Supplementary Benefit Acts 1966 to 1973 as the Supplementary Benefit Acts 1966 to 1975, . . .  3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  4 Except where the context otherwise requires, references in this Act to any enactment are references to that enactment as amended by or under any other enactment, including this Act. 5 Schedule 5 to this Act shall have effect with respect to the commencement of this Act and with respect to the transitional matters dealt with in that Schedule. 6 The enactments and Order mentioned in Schedule 6 to this Act are hereby repealed to the extent specified in the third column of that Schedule.
